name: RIB Project Database File
summary: Learn about .RPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions:
Programs that open or reference RPD files include

RIB iTWO (Paid)
Creating, opening, and importing RPD files in iTWO involves specific steps within the software’s interface. Below are general guidelines based on common practices in construction management software.

Launch iTWO: Start the iTWO application on your computer.Open Project: In the iTWO interface, look for an option to open existing projects. This might be under a “File” menu or a “Recent Projects” section.Browse for RPD File: Navigate to the location where your RPD file is saved. Select the RPD file you want to open and proceed.Project Access: Once you’ve selected the RPD file, iTWO will likely load the associated project data, allowing you to start working on the project.
